title: Did you formally charge North Carolina's election with "running" in the 2016 election?
subtitle: Richard Robert Rawling was accused of his alleged conduct in the initial elections in March 2016, but it had no effect on any outcome of the elections and there was no evidence that favoured any candidate or party.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2017, Richard Robert Rawling was charged with "flexible votes" for Donald Trump and other Republican candidates during the run-up election in March 2016.
